panels.title: Pending or Crashed Pods and Containers

targets.expr: sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{node=~"$Node", pod=~"$Pod", container=~"$Container"}) by (node, pod, container)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{node=~"$Node", pod=~"$Pod", container=~"$Container"}) by (node, pod, container)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_usage_memory_bytes{node=~"$Node", pod=~"$Pod", container=~"$Container"}) by (node, pod, container)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{node=~"$Node", pod=~"$Pod", container=~"$Container"}) by (node, pod, container)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{node=~"$Node", pod=~"$Pod", container=~"$Container"}) by (node, pod, container)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_usage_cpu_cores{node=~"$Node", pod=~"$Pod", container=~"$Container"}) by (node, pod, container)
